title: Carrot Fridge Storage Duration

items.name: Whole, unpeeled carrots
items.details: 3-4 weeks in the crisper drawer in a plastic bag or container to retain moisture.

items.name: Peeled carrots
items.details: Up to 2-3 weeks if stored in an airtight container or submerged in water (change the water every few days).

items.name: Cooked carrots
items.details: About 3-5 days in an airtight container.

items.name: Signs of spoilage
items.details: Discard if they become slimy, develop dark spots, or have a bad smell.

notes: Submerging peeled carrots in water and changing it every few days is a great way to extend their freshness.
